consume.originHTML:
Consume

Grants 50 ability power and 15 bonus mana regeneration for 180 seconds. While active, going in combat by affecting enemy champions or turrets deals 25 bonus true damage (5 second cooldown on each champion, no cooldown against turrets). Can be used while dead.
